projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my completed projects and others that are under construction:

project1.title: -Kart
project1.subtitle: Functional shopping cart design made with pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It has a responsive interface, allows you to manage products in the cart and saves data in real time with Firebase. Ideal for those who are learning e-commerce without frameworks. Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JS and Firebase.

project2.title: -To-do list
project2.subtitle: Web application for task management, developed with React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Allows you to add, edit, remove, and filter tasks, with real-time storage in Firebase Firestore. Ideal for practicing full stack development with a focus on productivity.

project3.title: -Platform of registration
project3.subtitle: Web platform developed with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, using Vite. It has a responsive and interactive interface, with address search via ViaCEP API. Customer data is saved in real time in Firebase, ideal for learning full stack applications. Technologies used: React Vite, Firebase and APi ViaCEP.

footer.thanks: Thank you for your time, portfolio released for use !
